content.webTitle: Burnley v West Ham United: match preview

fields.headline: Burnley v West Ham United: match preview
fields.bodyText: Burnley are on a slide again after losing three league games in a succession, and a major concern for Sean Dyche will be the nine goals conceded in the process. West Ham are usually accommodating visitors in these circumstances, their recent away form has been poor and Burnley won this fixture last season comfortably, though Manuel Pellegrini is under a certain amount of pressure at the moment and can ill afford to be overtaken in the table by today’s opponents. Paul Wilson Saturday 3pm Venue Turf Moor Last season Burnley 2 West Ham 0 Referee Kevin Friend This season G7 Y28 R3 4.43 cards/game Odds H 11-8 A 9-4 D 27-10 BURNLEY Subs from Hart, Legzdins, Rodriguez, Pieters, Brady, Gibson, Lennon, Bardsley, Vydra Doubtful Wood (hamstring) Injured Drinkwater (ankle, 23 Nov), Gudmundsson (hamstring, 23 Nov) Suspended None Discipline Y19 R0 Form WDWLLL Leading scorers Barnes, Wood 4 WEST HAM Subs from Martin, Zabaleta, Ogbonna, Masuaku, Cardoso, Wilshere, Coventry, Sánchez, Fornals, Holland, Ajeti, Yarmolenko Doubtful Wilshere (groin) Injured Antonio (hamstring, 23 Nov), Reid (match fitness, 23 Nov), Fabianski (hip, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y20 R1 Form WDLLDL Leading scorer Haller 4
